Two Factor Authentication: Use Google Authenticator

<small>When using the Two Factor Authentication, a 6-digit code needs to be entered in addition to username and password during login. Two Factor Authentication Google provides the Authenticator app for Android, BlackBerry and iOS.</small>
column3: muss während des Logins ein 6stelliger Code zusätzlich zu Benutzername und Password. Für die Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung stellt Google die Authenticator App für Android

Two Factor Authentication: Remember Me
Do not require 2-Factor-Authentication on this computer in the future. (Do not use this feature on public computers.)

Two Factor Authentication: Two-Factor Authentication protects your account from unauthorized access by requiring a second authentication method. In this case the second method is a Time-based One Time Password (TOTP).
"Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung": Two-Factor Authentication protects your account from unauthorized access by requiring a second authentication method. In this case the second method is a Time-based One Time Password (TOTP).

Two Factor Authentication: Google Authenticator is a general-purpose app which provides TOTP codes. It does not require a Google account, but does require a compatible device. Other TOTP applications compatible with Google Authenticator should work as well.
"Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung": Google Authenticator is a general-purpose app which provides TOTP codes. It does not require a Google account, but does require a compatible device. Other TOTP applications compatible with Google Authenticator should work as well.

Two Factor Authentication: After the initial setup is complete you will need to use the app to enter the 6-digit TOTP when authenticating on unrecognized computers.
"Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung": After the initial setup is complete you will need to use the app to enter the 6-digit TOTP when authenticating on unrecognized computers.

Two Factor Authentication: Choosing Remember Me" will set a cookie which will prevent you from having to enter the TOTP again on this device/browser
"Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung": but authenticating on other devices/browsers will still require the TOTP."

Two Factor Authentication: Note: This additional level of security does not replace the need for a strong and secret password and proper precautions to keep your account credentials secure should always be taken seriously.

Two Factor Authentication: Single-Use Backup Questions
What is this?
In the case that your TOTP app (e.g. Google Authenticator) becomes inoperable or is inaccessible you may use a secret question/answer pair to bypass the TOTP.
"Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung": In the case that your TOTP app (e.g. Google Authenticator) becomes inoperable or is inaccessible you may use a secret question/answer pair to bypass the TOTP.

Two Factor Authentication: Use only very secure questions and answers, or generate random answers and store them in a secure location and do not store them alongside your full account credentials.
"Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung": Use only very secure questions and answers, or generate random answers and store them in a secure location and do not store them alongside your full account credentials.
